subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Warriors, after winning 67 games in the regular season, are turning the playoffs into a grand stage for Stephen Curry, who has the uncanny ability to affect plays, games and even the entire league.
snippet: The Warriors, after winning 67 games in the regular season, are turning the playoffs into a grand stage for Stephen Curry, who has the uncanny ability to affect plays, games and even the entire league.
